content: it s a joy to stitch up this cheerful and fun crochet blanket that s fast to make in easy crochet stitches working in the soft hand of bernat baby velvet the wave crochet stitch is worked in double_crochet to achieve the playful zig and zag design we ve selected gentle and soothing tones but the pattern is customizable to look sweet in any shades for a girl or a boy
